social_posts.post_text:
What's crazy month this has been! So many menus, tastings, trainings, and order guides. Great things coming in 2023 for sure but I'm also looking forward to hibernating the last week of December 😆😴 one more tasting to go on Thursday! This little beauty is a combination of passion fruit, prickly pear, lime, spirit, and electricdust (buzz button) rim. Colorful, elegant, crushable.

#iceandalchemy #barconsultant #losangeles #bartraining #cocktails #cocktailmenu #newdrinks #newclients #newyear #mixology #drinkup #drinkspiration

It's "Dry" January and it's raining like crazy in LA! 🤣 Here's my new go-to dry January drink: @topochicousa, clarified lime juice, and clarified watermelon juice 🍉. This thing is crisp, clean, and stays bubbly for hours. I used SP-L clarification for the watermelon and a quick agar agar clarification for the lime juice. Easy breezy!

#iceandalchemy #barconsultant #losangeles #clarification #clarifiedjuice #dryjanuary  #topochico #sodawater #bubbly #mocktail #nonalcoholic #watermelondrink #watermelon

When your friend owns the best ice company in town and keeps your house fresh with cubes 😍🧊🥃 Let's make some drinks! @westcoasticepro 

#iceandalchemy #barconsultant #losangeles #ice #clearice #cleariceweek #chillin #bartenderlife #barlife #barlifestyle

My favorite classic cocktail of all time. Check out the video for more info and here's my preferred recipe:

2oz barrel aged old Tom Gin
3/4 oz sweet vermouth
1/4 oz maraschino liqueur
2x angostura bitters

Stir and strain with an orange twist. 

I sometimes vary the proportions based on the specific brands I'm using at the time, but this is my typical go-to recipe.

One of my favorite old time gins is Ransom Old Tom from Oregon. The bottles never last too long at my house haha.

What are your thoughts on this drink?

#iceandalchemy #barconsultant #losangeles #classiccocktail #keepitclassy #stirreddrinks #gin #oldtomgin #martinez #barlife #bartenderlife #simplicityisking

Valentine’s Day is just around the corner so it only seems fitting to wear our hearts on our sleeve and highlight one of our favorite variations of a Negroni. 

•Mezcal
•Cynar 
•Sweet Vermouth (Punt e mes, but you can use whichever your heart desires) 
🧊 by @westcoasticepro 

What’s a favorite drink that’s near and dear to your heart ? 

Stay tuned. We’ve been working on some neat stuff coming down the pipeline, including tips on how to handle dry ice and other bar techniques ! Cheers 🥂 

#valentines #heart #ice #ontherocks #drinkoftheday #cocktaillovers #barconsultant #homebartenders #negroni #mezcal #sweetvermouth #heybartender #heartonyoursleeve

Hey look, I'm posting! It's been a nice break but it's time to slowly get back to it! We've been so busy opening new bars that I had to relieve myself from the pressure of posting daily. 

Fortunately, @agave_kween and I took this time to film some great videos with friends like @jasonfyu, @cocktailsbyhawk, @86.thebartender and others that well be posting soon. 

I also think we have a new direction for this account rather than how I used to do it (post randomly when I had time) that will be more fun and educational for everyone (more about that later). 

For now, here is a pretty little drink that's now available at the new @elsancholocotaqueria in Westlake Village area! House orgeat, passion fruit, lime, tequila, mezcal, and bitters with a mint crystal/salt rim. I'm a huge fan of every cocktail we made for this menu and it's being extremely well received by the neighborhood!

#iceandalchemy #barconsultant #losangeles #cocktails #newrestaurant #newcocktails #westlakevillage #thousandoaks #tropical #margarita #agave #tequila #mezcal #drinkspiration #happyhour #mixology

This is the La Flor at the new opening of @elsancholocotaqueria_y_cantina! This whole menu is so exciting so if you live int he Westlake Village/Thousand Oaks area definitely check it out! This drink has your choice of hibiscus-infused reposado tequila/mezcal/or vodka, lime juice, vanilla, and ginger beer. Simple and oh-so crushable!

#iceandalchemy #barconsulting #thousandoaks @trendieats #cocktails #newmenu #drinktime #moscowmule #tequila #cocktaillover #tequilalover #mezcallover

Let's review the new Gevi GIMN-1000B household nugget ice maker! Big thanks to @gevi_household who sent me this to try out. This is a 100% honest review, so keep reading for your 35% coupon if you want to grab your own Gevi nugget ice maker!

Ok, let's get to the nuts and bolts: If you know me then you know I'm all about great ice. This machine makes the most consistent nuggets I've had, especially for home use. They are the perfect size, crunch-ability, and they last longer than other pebbles I've tried. 

The machine itself is about 17" tall which may seem large, but that's standard for these types of ice makers and it will fit under the cabinets in your kitchen when set on the counter. Plus it has a sleak design that I want people to see and ask what it is. Bottom line, this really is the best household nugget ice maker available! Check out the video for more reasons why I love this machine.

I told them how much I like it so they gave me a 35% off code to share with you all! apply coupon code"GEVINIM35" to save it! That's HUGE!! Click the link in my bio to be taken directly to the page to get yours!

#iceandalchemy #gevihosehold #gevinuggeticemaker #geviicemaker #nuggeticemaker #pebbleice #pebbleicemachine #icegame #cocktailice #homebar #drinksathome #houseparty #hosting

Montrèal, Canada. Where do I even begin? 🇨🇦 

I googled “places that feel like Europe” because Josh and I wanted to go somewhere similar without traveling so far! Flash forward to us booking a couple of tickets to Montrèal without knowing a thing about the city (very unlike us)! ✈️ 

The moment we stepped into Old Town, we felt like we were transported to Europe with cafès at every turn, beautiful brasseries, jazz bars, rooftop terraces and French being the primary language of the city! 

Between an unplanned cirque du soleil “Echo” show (a MUST see) to some of the best meals we’ve ever eaten, walking an average of 7 miles a day to explore, spa days and a fun little pre-anniversary photoshoot (with @marinegibert_photographer), this trip is one of our most memorable to date! 

It was so amazing to travel to a foodie city like this and just eat INTUITIVELY in the moment. In the past, I’d either restrict myself and have major FOMO or binge the entire time and leave feeling sick and guilt ridden. Am I excited to get back into a solid routine making meals from home and regularly strength training? 💪 Absolutely!

What’s your favorite memory from traveling lately or somewhere you want to see soon? 👇

#holistichealth #balancedlifestyle #montreal #intuitiveeating #balance

It's always fun shooting with @86.thebartender! 

Here I'm playing with the flavors of a resin liqueur from Greece called mastiha. Have you had it? I've made frankincense infusions and syrups before and this liqueur reminds me a lot of those. In this cocktail, I'm putting together blended scotch with mastiha, lemon, and a peach/chamomile foam. This tastes like summer in a glass! 

#iceandalchemy #barconsultant #losangeles #cocktails #foam #peach #scotch #blendedscotch #whiskylover #scotchwhisky #mastiha #greece #liqueur #mixology #cocktailsathome #cocktailmenu #happyhour #drinkswithfriends #livinglife

It’s #NationalNegroniWeek and while a Negroni is traditionally made with gin, I want to celebrate with a little whisky. Starward Two-Fold whisky, in particular! This whisky has such a rich flavor profile and is extremely versatile, making it an easy choice for both pro-bartenders and home-bartenders. Watch the vid to hear some of the reasons why I enjoy this spirit so much. Want to make a delicious whisky Negroni in one easy step? Check out Starward’s award-winning bottled cocktails that are definitely worth getting your hands on!#starwardpartner 

@starwardwhiskyus #StarwardUSA #StarwardSummer #WorldsBestWhisky #iceandalchemy #whisky #australia #barrelaged #bar #liquor #spirits #negroni #negroniweek #ad

Getting the brightest, poppiest flavors out of ingredients that are high in water content can be tricky, especially if you are applying them to alow-AVB cocktail recipe. This method allows me to take coffee (in this case) and really maximize its effect on the overall composition of the drink. 

Coffee, teas, melon juices, and prickly pears all work well with this technique! Who's on board with this?? 🙋‍♂️

#iceandalchemy #blendeddrinks #blendedcocktails #espressomartini #carajillo #FlavorfulCocktail #IceCubeDelight #RefreshingDrinks #MixologyMagic #CocktailCreations #FlavoredIceCubes #DrinkInnovation #FrozenTreats #TastyLibations #CreativeMixes #FlavorBurst #ChilledCocktails #IceCubeInspiration #BeverageBlend #FrozenFantasy #BoldFlavors #CocktailPerfection #DrinkRevolution #FlavoredFizz #IceCubeEuphoria

I love this drink! Full recipe in the video, some tips are below:

• The biggest variable in this drink is going to be the brand of coconut 🥥 water you use. Some brands have more sugar than others so adjust your amount of simple syrup appropriately to accommodate
• If I were to customize this right now based on my mood, I'd probably find a way to add some passionfruit to this recipe by splitting my simple syrup with passionfruit puree/syrup. A tally infusing the genever with oolong tea 🌿 sounds really good too... Or both... I might need to try this actually...

Let me know your thoughts a or ask any questions below!

#iceandalchemy #InAgenever #InAgin #InAswizzle #genever #gin #pebbleice #punch #icegame #nuggetice #coconut #coconutwater #refreshing #cocktails #mixology #mixeddrinks #craftcocktails #cocktailrecipe #drinkrecipe #recipeoftheday #cocktailsforyou @bolscocktailsusa @bolscocktails @vitacoco @tastenirvana @harmlessharvest

One of my favorite classic cocktails! Recipe in the video, some tips are below! 

One of the bigger variables in this drink is the brand of maraschino liqueur. I find Luxardo to be a little loud so I actually dial it back a 1/4 oz and increase my gin 1/4 oz. If I'm using Maraska, then I keep the classic ratios. 

This recipe begs to be potato-headed so swap any of these ingredients for like-ingredients. Mezcal Last Word, anyone? Let me know if you want me to do a video of a Last Word Variation!

If you've never had this drink, do it this weekend. You'll be introduced into the dry gin world in all the best ways. It uses green Chartreuse, which can be aggressive but in this drink it works perfectly. As always, if you have any questions hit me up!

Who's played with this recipe? 👇

My neighbor has a yuzu tree, so I take. But there wasn't enough to make many cocktails. The solution? Make super juice! I made 16 oz of super juice from 4 small yuzu fruits. This video shows you the preparation method for any super juice you want to make. Check out Kevin kos for an acid ratio calculator for your super juices! 

The benefits of super juices include yield, an extremely bright flavor from the oils in the peels, and extended shelf life (weeks as compared to days of standard fresh juices!). 

Who's played with super juices before?

#iceandalchemy #InAsuperjuice #freshjuice #juicerecipes #superjuice #yuzu #drinkrecipe #cocktailrecipe #craftcocktails #cocktailhour  #mixology #drinkstagram #cocktailrecipe #bartenderlife #drinkup #cocktailsofinstagram #instadrinks #drinkspiration #cocktailtime #thirstythursday #imbibe #cheers #drinkporn #cocktailgram #happyhour #cocktaillover #mixology

So we did a THING…. (Swipe to reveal our big news)…. 🥰

…We adopted another fur baby (not quite ready for the human kind yet 😉) Meet Chestnut… she is 3.5 months old and weighs 5lbs! She’s 41% chihuahua, part poodle and part schnauzer (+ a few other breeds)! 🌰 Josh has been wanting @preshthepit to have a sister for some time now and although I love my pitty, I wasn’t ready to adopt another big dog so we found this little nugget (who has been through the ringer!) and she is full of love, energy and personality! 

Presh isn’t so sure about her new sister yet (gives her the cold shoulder) but we know she will come around and can’t wait for the day when they are besties! 🐶 

If you’ve ever been curious about what adopting a puppy is like (Presh was born in the shelter), we are happy to answer your questions! Pitbulls and Chihuahuas are two of the top breeds found in shelters and they are both breeds with stigmas (I even had my own before adopting)! So far, I couldn’t have asked for more loving, sweet natured and intelligent pups! The holidays just got a whole lot brighter 🎄💝

#adoptdontshop #pitbullsofinstagram #pittynation

DRY ICE TECHNIQUE: I get requests for dry ice on menus all the time. Using it safely is key. 

Here I use a French press to stir a pre-diluted clarified margarita. It's pre-diluted because dry ice doesn't provide any dilution, just the chill factor. 

The presentation is sexy, it can be done tableside, and the French press keeps all dry ice out of the finished cocktail so that the guest is safe to drink the damn drink.

Let me know if you give this a try!

#IceAndAlchemyGingerBeer #HomeMadeGingerBeer #RecipeOfTheDay #Cocktails #MulledWine #MoscowMule #Mixology #GingerBeer #Homemade #DrinksAtHome #FreshIngedients #CustomRecipe #Carbonated #TasteOfHome #BrewingAtHome #WinterDrinks #FlavorfulCreations #HandcraftedSips #Sip

This classic cocktail structure is maybe the easiest to play with if you're new to customizing drinks. Why? It's refreshing and each ingredient plays enough of a role to make a noticeable difference when customized/substituted. In order to maximize the amount of volume of the simple syrup, I use a 1:1 syrup. That way, if I infuse it then there will be more of that flavor in the composition of the drink. 

Tom Collins Structure
• 3/4 oz any 1:1 simple syrup
• 3/4 oz sour (lemon or lime juice)
• 2 oz spirit (I used Old Tom gin)
• top with bubbles 

How might you customize this recipe?
